function.note:
Human genome (hg19) fasta retrieval from bundle resource of GATK. Downloaded via command:
wget -q ftp://gsapubftp-anonymous@ftp.broadinstitute.org/bundle/b37/human_g1k_v37.fasta.gz

Human genome (hg19) fasta.fai retrieval from bundle resource of GATK. Downloaded via command:
wget -q ftp://gsapubftp-anonymous@ftp.broadinstitute.org/bundle/b37/human_g1k_v37.fasta.fai.gz

Human genome (hg19) fasta.dict retrieval from bundle resource of GATK. Downloaded via command:
wget -q ftp://gsapubftp-anonymous@ftp.broadinstitute.org/bundle/b37/human_g1k_v37.dict.gz

dbSNP known variant retrieval from bundle resource of GATK. Downloaded via command:
wget -q ftp://gsapubftp-anonymous@ftp.broadinstitute.org/bundle/b37/dbsnp_138.b37.excluding_sites_after_129.vcf.gz

1000Genomes Project known indels retrieval from bundle resource of GATK. Downloaded via command:
wget -q ftp://gsapubftp-anonymous@ftp.broadinstitute.org/bundle/b37/1000G_phase1.indels.b37.vcf.gz

1000Genomes Project low coverage CEU genotypes retrieval from 1000Genomes Project repository. Downloaded via command:
wget -q ftp://ftp.1000genomes.ebi.ac.uk/vol1/ftp/pilot_data/release/2010_07/low_coverage/snps/CEU.low_coverage.2010_07.genotypes.vcf.gz

Genome indexing obtained using bwa (version 0.5.8c). Used command:
bwa index -a bwtsw human_g1k_v37.fasta

Input reads SA coordinates generation using bwa (version 0.5.8c). Used commands:
bwa aln <genome fasta file> <fastq 1 file> -f "prefix_1.sai"
bwa aln <genome fasta file> <fastq 2 file> -f "prefix_2.sai"

Read mapping obtained using bwa (version 0.5.8c) and picard tools (version 1.32). Used command:
bwa sampe -P -p <platform> -i <lane> -m <sample ID> -l <library> <genome fasta file> <prefix_1.sai> <prefix_2.sai> <fastq 1 file> <fastq 2 file> | java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/SamFormatConverter.jar INPUT=/dev/stdin OUTPUT=<bam file>

Mapped read sorting using picard tools (version 1.32) based on chromosome order on genome fasta file and coordinate position of mapped reads. Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/SortSam.jar INPUT=<bam file> OUTPUT=<sorted bam file> SORT_ORDER=coordinate

Indexing of BAM sorted file using picard-tools (version 1.32). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/BuildBamIndex.jar INPUT=<sorted bam file> OUTPUT=<sorted bam index file>

Duplicated reads detection using picard-tools (version 1.32). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/MarkDuplicates.jar INPUT=<sorted bam file> OUTPUT=<No duplicates bam file> METRICS_FILE=<metric file> REMOVE_DUPLICATES=false ASSUME_SORTED=true

Indexing of BAM sorted file using picard-tools (version 1.32). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/BuildBamIndex.jar INPUT=<No duplicates bam file> OUTPUT=<No duplicates bam index file>

Identification of suspicious intervals which are likely in need of realignment using GATK (version 1.1). Used command:
java -Xmx10g -jar GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -l INFO -T RealignerTargetCreator -R <genome fasta file> -I <No duplicates bam file> -o <intervals file>

Realignment around indels using GATK (version 1.1). Used command:
java -Xmx10g -jar GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -l INFO -T IndelRealigner -U ALLOW_UNINDEXED_BAM -I <No duplicates bam file> -targetIntervals <intervals file> -R <genome fasta file> -known <dbsnp VCF file> -known <known indels 1000Genomes Project VCF file> -o <realigned bam file> -LOD 0.4 -compress 0

Fixing aligned mate pairs using picard tools (version 1.32). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/FixMateInformation.jar INPUT=<realigned bam file> OUTPUT=<mate fixed bam SORT_ORDER=coordinate

Indexing of BAM fixed mate file using picard-tools (version 1.32). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/BuildBamIndex.jar INPUT=<mate fixed bam file> OUTPUT=<mate fixed bam index file>

Building model of covariation based on the data and a set of known variants retrieved from dbSNP and using GATK (version 1.1). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -l INFO -T CountCovariates -U ALLOW_UNINDEXED_BAM -R <genome fasta file> -knownSites <dbsnp VCF file> -I <mate fixed bam file> -cov ReadGroupcovariate -cov QualityScoreCovariate -cov CycleCovariate -cov DinucCovariate -recalFile <covariates csv table>

Base recalibration based on model of covariation obtained in the previous step based on the data and a set of known variants using GATK (version 1.1). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -l INFO -T TableRecalibration -U ALLOW_UNINDEXED_BAM -R <genome fasta file> -I <mate fixed bam file> --recal_file <covariates csv table> --out <recalibrated bam>

Recalibrated read sorting using picard tools (version 1.32) based on chromosome order on genome fasta file and coordinate position of mapped reads. Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/SortSam.jar INPUT=<recalibrated bam> OUTPUT=<sorted recalibrated bam> SORT_ORDER=coordinate
java -jar -Xmx4g picard-tools/BuildBamIndex.jar INPUT=<sorted recalibrated bam> OUTPUT=<sorted recalibrated bam index file>

Building model of covariation based on the data and a set of known variants retrieved from dbSNP and using GATK (version 1.1). Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g GenomeAnalysisTK.jar -l INFO -T CountCovariates -U ALLOW_UNINDEXED_BAM -R <genome fasta file> -knownSites <dbsnp VCF file> -I <sorted recalibrated bam> -cov ReadGroupcovariate -cov QualityScoreCovariate -cov CycleCovariate -cov DinucCovariate -recalFile <recalibrated covariates csv table>

Visualization of covariates computed before the base quality score recalibration using GATK (version 1.1) .Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g AnalyzeCovariates.jar -l INFO -resources <R path> --recal_file <mate fixed bam file>  -outputDir <before folder>

Visualization of covariates computed after the base quality score recalibration using GATK (version 1.1) .Used command:
java -jar -Xmx4g AnalyzeCovariates.jar -l INFO -resources <R path> --recal_file <sorted recalibrated bam file>  -outputDir <after folder>

summary.description: The described pipeline is aimed to replicate data stored at EGA generated by the GoNL consortium
summary.name: EOSC pipeline-Reproducibility
